resources.string:
Welcome!

Monyrama on your mobile device is the helper for desktop Monyrama.

Monyrama lets you have your expenses plans and income sources on your mobile device and register your expenses and incomes anywhere you are.

For exchanging data with the desktop Monyrama you will need only your home WiFi network.

If you\'re not a user of desktop Monyrama, please, visit our site first

http://www.monyrama.com

So, tap the Start button and make your life easier with Monyrama.
